name: arhamh.eth

projects.title: Hedged.
projects.description: Open-source hegding for anyone that buys or sells commodities.

services.title: Smart contract development
services.description: I'm familiar with smart contract development in Solidity and Clarity for EVM-compatible chains and the Stacks chain, respectively. Past projects include a DEX indexed to invest in athlete performance and creating a marketplace for ERC-1155 tokens.

services.title: Investment vehicles
services.description: I've created and deployed SPVs to facilitate investments in Charlton Athletic (a Premier League football team)'s player acquisition and revenue from sell ons. $2M raised, legal process facilitated by Assure.

services.title: Data science
services.description: I've developed web scraping and data analysis scripts using Python (NumPy, Pandas) and R. Past projects include optimizing driver-order allocation for a food delivery platform and scraping Twitter for relevant athletes to promote a product.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I'm picking up React.js and Next.js for the front-end. I'm not an expert – this website is my first take on web dev.

aboutpara1: I'm the cofounder of VO2: backed by Techstars, Rough Draft Ventures, and Eberg Capital.
aboutpara2: I'm studying Finance/Math at UPenn Wharton. On campus, I was part of the Genesis Cohort of Wharton's Cypher Accelerator. Prior to that, I went through through Jane Street's SEE program and was a Venture Analyst at Redbud Brands.
aboutpara3: I'm passionate about DeFi (specifically bringing real assets on chain), prediction markets, making derivatives more accessible, basketball, and surfing.
